StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
Goal oriented engineering executive with keen eye on execution, organizational efficiency and long-term strategy, developing enterprise class consumer internet platforms.
What makes this possible: Extensive experience in developing highly scalable Consumer Internet technologies (like ecommerce platforms, SAAS etc.) Good understanding of data structures and algorithms. Create and Manage rock star team focused in skills, organizational efficiency, process optimization for delivering world class products at lightning speed. Collaborate with all lines of business, solution providers, technologists and thought leaders. I love what I do.
Key Highlights: - Product Strategy and direction Product Architecture Engineering Management Process Improvement On time product delivery Product design, development, quality and usability Good Team Player Problem Solving attitude Highly energetic and self-motivated Able to handle multiple projects at same time Experience in handling team of 15-20 people

PositionHistory.Title: Senior Engineering Manager
PositionHistory.Description: It is an ecommerce startup working in the automobile and automobile services only. Joined Droom in it's very early days built many products here from first line of code like Catalogue Management System, Coupon Management System, Cart & Checkout, Orangebookvalue.com etc. Currently managing the whole buyer side of Droom marketplace from homepage to successfully order placement along with DroomCredit.com which is another marketplace for loans.

PositionHistory.Title: Technical Lead
PositionHistory.Description: It is an event listing platform earlier known as biztradeshow.com. Played a very important role in migrating biztradeshow.com to 10times.com. Build many functionalities from scratch including an event management dashboard for organizer where they can manage and track whole life cycle of an event from visitor management, exhibitor management, hassle free entry via barcode etc. *India's biggest trade fair IITF is successfully managed by this software.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 33% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Co-Founder
PositionHistory.Description: It is a startup co-founded by me working in the education domain. The idea was to establish the brand for providing summer training, seminars and placements for students.

Degree.Comments:
Bachelor of Technology (Computer Science) ABES Engineering College (2007-2011)
th 12 (PCM)

Achievement.Description: It is very precious award given for very impactful contribution in Droom, very few people got this award till
Pillar of Success (Ten Times Pvt. Ltd.)
For revamping the event onboarding panel successfully which reduces the time of event onboarding by 20
For creating developing India's first algorithmic pricing engine for used automobile within a very tight deadline
For designing and implementation of Droom Credit (marketplace for loans), and manage to deliver this whole

NonXMLResume.TextResume:
Rahul Raman Email: 007rahulraman@gmail.com Phone: +91-9899075461 Address: 17A, Kirti Nagar, Sector 15 Part 1, Gurugram
Summary: Goal oriented engineering executive with keen eye on execution, organizational efficiency and long-term strategy, developing enterprise class consumer internet platforms.
What makes this possible: Extensive experience in developing highly scalable Consumer Internet technologies (like ecommerce platforms, SAAS etc.) Good understanding of data structures and algorithms. Create and Manage rock star team focused in skills, organizational efficiency, process optimization for delivering world class products at lightning speed. Collaborate with all lines of business, solution providers, technologists and thought leaders. I love what I do.
Key Highlights: - Product Strategy and direction Product Architecture Engineering Management Process Improvement On time product delivery Product design, development, quality and usability Good Team Player Problem Solving attitude Highly energetic and self-motivated Able to handle multiple projects at same time Experience in handling team of 15-20 people
Work Experience: -
Edumonk Technologies Pvt. Ltd (Co-Founder, July 2011 to June 2012) It is a startup co-founded by me working in the education domain. The idea was to establish the brand for providing summer training, seminars and placements for students.
Ten Times Online Private Limited (Technical Lead, June 2012 to Dec 2014) It is an event listing platform earlier known as biztradeshow.com. Played a very important role in migrating biztradeshow.com to 10times.com. Build many functionalities from scratch including an event management dashboard for organizer where they can manage and track whole life cycle of an event from visitor management, exhibitor management, hassle free entry via barcode etc. *India's biggest trade fair IITF is successfully managed by this software.
Droom Technology Pvt. Ltd (Senior Engineering Manager, Feb 2015 to till date) It is an ecommerce startup working in the automobile and automobile services only. Joined Droom in it's very early days built many products here from first line of code like Catalogue Management System, Coupon Management System, Cart & Checkout, Orangebookvalue.com etc. Currently managing the whole buyer side of Droom marketplace from homepage to successfully order placement along with DroomCredit.com which is another marketplace for loans.
Skills: -
Programming: JavaScript, JQuery, PHP, Core JAVA(moderate), Laravel, Algorithms, Data Structures, OOPS, Solution Design, Design Patterns, REST API Databases: MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, Memcached OS: Linux, Windows, Mac
Education: -
Bachelor of Technology (Computer Science) ABES Engineering College (2007-2011)
th 12 (PCM) Christian Inter College (2005-2006)
th 10 (Math) Christian Inter College (2003-2004)
Projects: -
Orange Book Value It is a platform that helps in determining the fair market price for a used vehicle. It is an algorithmic pricing engine that used real time data science and value depreciation of automobile to suggest market value of used automobiles. Role: Architecture Design and Implementation
Droom Credit It is a marketplace for loan which helps borrowers to connect right lenders according to the lender loan eligibility criteria and helps lenders to provide an online paper free solution. Role: Architecture Design and Implementation
Catalogue Management System This is the base of core marketplace of Droom. It consists of Category, Product and Listing. Successfully revamped the CMS from launching the new category within few hours from few days. Role: Architecture Design and Implementation
Ecommerce Cart & Checkout The aim of this module to enable online transactions on Droom marketplace. It includes Cart, Checkout, Orders, Order flow management and Coupon Management. Role: Architecture Design and Implementation
Droom International Expansion Design the architecture for launching the Droom Marketplace, OrangeBookValue and Droom Discovery in multiple countries. Solved the problem for multiple language in the same country and global reporting. Here is list of product countries wise successfully launched. OrangeBookValue - Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand Droom Discovery - Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand Role: Architecture Design and Implementation
Auction & Best Offer Auction functionality is just same as offline auction where multiple users can bid for the same product and depending on the time maximum bidder will win while best offer is allowing buyer and seller to negotiate on a price and stable a price like bargaining. Role: Implementation
Biztradeshow.com to 10times.com Purpose of this project to revamp the old platform to a new platform with new design and revamp the database so that it can be more flexible and scalable.
Event Management System The purpose of this project to build a robust system for event organizers so that they can manage their event online from visitor to exhibitors to promotions.
Awards and Recognitions: -
Pillar of Success (Ten Times Pvt. Ltd.) For revamping the event onboarding panel successfully which reduces the time of event onboarding by 20% and operation cost reduced by 60%.
Top Gear (Droom Technology Pvt. Ltd) For creating developing India's first algorithmic pricing engine for used automobile within a very tight deadline single handedly.
Top Gear (Droom Technology Pvt. Ltd) For designing and implementation of Droom Credit (marketplace for loans), and manage to deliver this whole project within required time.
Founder's Award (Droom Technology Pvt. Ltd) It is very precious award given for very impactful contribution in Droom, very few people got this award till now in Droom.

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Rahul Raman's experience appears to be somewhat concentrated in Sales (mostly Direct Sales) and somewhat concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Internet). Rahul Raman has 8 years of work experience, with 8 years of management experience, including a high-level position.
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:ManagementStory: Current position is a mid-level management role: Senior Engineering Manager Starting on 2/1/2015, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 4 years and 10 months: Title: Senior Engineering Manager for Droom Technology Pvt. Ltd Starting on 6/1/2012, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 2 years and 6 months: Title: Technical Lead for Ten Times Online Private Limited Starting on 7/1/2011, the candidate held the following executive-level management position for 11 months: Title: Co-Founder for Edumonk Technologies Pvt. Ltd

sov:Findings.sov:Information: [Sovren:303;4] The following section in the resume contains more content than the work history and education sections combined: 'Projects'. This may indicate a problem with section headers, formatting, or content.
[Sovren:231;DEG-2] The following educational degree does not have a degree name: DEG-2. Every degree in a resume should have a name or type associated with it, such as 'B.S.' or 'M.S.'.

[Sovren:112;] The following section was identified as a skills section type: 'Skills'. Skills should not be in a separate section, but instead, each skill should be included in the descriptions of work history or education.

[Sovren:151;1,2,3,4,5] The following sections do not have the header on a separate line: 'Work Experience', 'Skills', 'Education', 'Projects', 'Awards and Recognitions'. Every section should have a clear, unambiguous, commonly-used header on a separate line directly above the content associated with it.

sov:ResumeUserArea.sov:ParserConfigurationString: Coverage.MilitaryHistoryAndSecurityCredentials = True; Coverage.PatentsPublicationsAndSpeakingEvents = True; Coverage.PersonalAttributes = True; Coverage.Training = True; Culture.CountryCodeForUnitedKingdomIsUK = True; Culture.DefaultCountryCode = IN; Culture.DefaultCultureIsIndia = True; Culture.Language = English; Culture.PreferEnglishVersionIfTwoLanguagesInDocument = False; Data.UserDefinedParsing = False; OutputFormat.AssumeCompanyNameFromPrecedingJob = False; OutputFormat.ContactMethod.PackStyle = Split; OutputFormat.DateOutputStyle = ExplicitlyKnownDateInfoOnly; OutputFormat.NestJobsBasedOnDateRanges = True; OutputFormat.NormalizeRegions = False; OutputFormat.SkillsStyle = Default; OutputFormat.StripParsedDataFromPositionHistoryDescription = True; OutputFormat.TelcomNumber.Style = Raw; OutputFormat.XmlFormat = HrXmlResume25
